DocAttribute.Name: StartDistAlong
DocAttribute.Documentation: Distance along the horizontal alignment, measured along the IfcAlignment2DHorizontal given in the length unit of the global IfcUnitAssignment.

DocAttribute.Name: HorizontalLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured as distance along the horizontal alignment of the segment.

DocAttribute.Name: StartCantLeft
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured for the left cant at the beginning of the segment.

DocAttribute.Name: EndCantLeft
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured for the left cant at the end of the segment.

DocAttribute.Name: StartCantRight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured for the right cant at the beginning of the segment.

DocAttribute.Name: EndCantRight
DocAttribute.Documentation: Length measured for the right cant at the end of the segment.
